DataElement.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Third Most Bothersome Symptom Attributed to Steroids Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of the third most bothersome symptom they have experienced due to their treatment with steriods.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire-Chronic Third Most Bothersome Symptom Attributed to Steroids
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy._Following the second position in an ordering or series; coming next after the second and just before the fourth in position._A question about an individual's most bothersome symptom attributed to steroid use.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire for patients with brain tumors that is designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy.
